description: In celebration of Thomas' return, we are featuring a brand new solo of Thomas that we filmed his first night back here at the compound. Thomas is growing more and more masculine as time goes by and he's hornier than ever as we've witnessed in our latest release, Caught in the Crossfire. He tears Gio's ass a new one in that DVD. Take time to check out Thomas tonight in a brand new, never-before-seen solo as this hero makes a strong return to Active Duty.
title: Thomas, Scene #01
